scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015] ] -t [ vueify ] -e ./src/app.js -o ./dist/index.js
scripts.files: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/favicon.ico dist/ && cp src/assets/* dist/assets/
scripts.start: yarn files && yarn style & yarn build:dev & serve dist
scripts.style: node-sass src/main.style.scss dist/main.style.css && node-sass src/main.style.scss dist/main.style.css -w
